description:
Gil is one of the side characters of the Shadow House series. He is a Living Doll working as a servant in the mansion and as the "Face" of Gilbert. He is a fit boy, with a strong build. He has short black hair with a triangular fringe, sharp gray eyes and arrow-shaped eyebrows. He usually wears a standard male "Living Doll" uniform or a Portrait when serving as Gilbert`s "face". He is also often seen wearing the soot suit with a white cap with frills and a red armband on his left arm as a sign of him being a part of the First-Aid team (Medic team).
Source: Shadows House Wiki
name: Gil
